abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch named three executives on Tuesday to run its $450 billion retirement services business, including rehiring a former executive who left earlier this year.
snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch named three executives on Tuesday to run its $450 billion retirement services business, including rehiring a former executive who left earlier this year.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch named three executives on Tuesday to run its $450 billion retirement services business, including rehiring a former executive who left earlier this year.

headline.main: BofA Merrill Shakes Up Retirement Unit

abstract: The Apollo Investment Corporation, a publicly traded affiliate of the private equity firm Apollo Global Management, said Tuesday it planned to sell 10 million shares of common stock to the public and use the proceeds to pay down debt.
snippet: The Apollo Investment Corporation, a publicly traded affiliate of the private equity firm Apollo Global Management, said Tuesday it planned to sell 10 million shares of common stock to the public and use the proceeds to pay down debt.
lead_paragraph: The Apollo Investment Corporation, a publicly traded affiliate of the private equity firm Apollo Global Management, said Tuesday that it planned to sell 10 million shares of common stock to the public and use the proceeds to pay down debt.

headline.main: Apollo Investment to Sell 10 Million Shares
